Study Skills & IT Support

For support and guidance on studying for your specific subject, take a look at our Study Skills & IT Support pages where you can find tips and book sessions with our Tutor Librarians.

Visit page »

The Digital Village

The Digital Village encompases our Library and self-directed study spaces, as well as our events and lecturing theatre named 'The Apple'. We're found on the first floor of the link building, accessed near the lifts on the first floor of the tower block.

If you're interested and want to learn more, click the button below to visit our Digital Village page - where you'll also find information about up-and-coming events and open-access lectures.

Visit page »

Contact us

The Digital Village can be contacted by email or by telephone during our opening hours. If you have an enquiry, please don't hesitate to get in touch.

  • Email: library@cityplym.ac.uk
  • Phone: 01752 305366
